title: Ride Hard
description: **This is book 2 of the Condemned Angels MC Series**Jeremy Moretti, son the of the Condemned Angel’s President, has always had eyes for Nicole, his baby sister’s best friend.Nicole has eyes for both Jeremy and Hunter.The Condemned Angels MC is the only family she has left. After a series of events that almost cost Nicole to take her own life, Jeremy was the one to save her.They have both struggled with sexual frustration for years, and have been holding back on each other. Being too stubborn and hard headed, Jeremy decides it’s best to push her away. When he doesn’t step up to the plate, Hunter is there to break her fall. While Hunter and Nicole’s relationship blossoms, Jeremy tries to move on. However, he can’t let her go. It always comes back to her.After the death of the rival MC’s President, Ryder, has the Devil’s MC in a uproar as Ryder’s surviving brother, Jax has come to seek revenge. With revenge, Jax brings unknown secrets that pertain to Nicole, which may risk everything, her safety, her MC family, and most importantly, Jeremy.
author: Heather  Leigh
